Name: Eveslan
About the game: Eveslan have 2 game mode. 1 Battlefield mode, 2 Book mode. Battlfield mode have 2 team with swords. Player battle with classic rpg controls. Surviving team wins. Book mode is old type text graphic game. Bookmode playing on UI just like old browser games. But it is simple and short game which you play on your computer. You have a character on game which have level, health, damage. When you level up your character will be more stronger so will can more works. Game play on 5 menu 1-Items Foods, cures, resources, tools, weapons at this menu. You can energy up with eat food. Health up with use cure. And equip items for make your character more strong. 2-Work You can gather resources with working. So can use resources to make crafts or use. 3-Craft You can craft useful items at this menu 4-Equipment This menu shows your characters items. 5-Adventure Fighting with strong enemies at this menu and gain more exp.
